ABOUT_TEXT: We provide a complete service for the accommodation of seasonal personnel. With more than 10 years of experience we have placed hundreds of employees in apartments and houses across the island of Myconos.
NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to receive updates about the Center for Continuing Education and Lifelong Learning of NKUA
TERMS_OF_USE_SECTION1: The use of the online pages and services of i-staff.gr by the visitor / user presupposes his unreserved agreement with the following terms of use, which apply to all content, pages, graphics, images, photographs and files included on our website. Therefore, the visitor/user must read these terms carefully before using its services and if they do not agree, they must not use our services and content. The visitor/user is requested to check the content of the specific pages for possible changes. The continuation of the use of i-staff.gr even after any changes means the unreserved acceptance of these terms on the part of the visitor / user.
COPYRIGHT_TEXT: The entire content of this website, including real estate data, texts, graphics, photos, videos, services provided, is the intellectual property of i-staff.gr and is governed by national and international provisions on Intellectual Property. Logos, brands, trademarks and features included in the website belong to i-staff.gr and are protected in accordance with the existing legislation on industrial and intellectual property.
COOKIES_POLICY_GENERAL: Our Company i-staff uses cookies on  http://i-staff.gr . By using the Service, you consent to the use of cookies. Our Cookies Policy explains what cookies are, how we use cookies, how third-parties we may partner with may use cookies on the Service, your choices regarding cookies and further information about cookies.
COOKIES_POLICY_SECTION1: Cookies are small pieces of text sent by your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the Service or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the Service more useful to you. Cookies can be “persistent” or “session” cookies.
PRIVACY_POLICY_GENERAL: Welcome to http://i-staff. We understand that privacy online is important to users of our Site, especially when conducting business.This statement governs our privacy policies with respect to those users of the Site who visit without transacting business and Visitors who register to transact business on the Site and make use of the various services offered by i-Staff.
PRIVACY_POLICY_SECTION1: refers to any information that identifies or can be used to identify, contact, or locate the person to whom such information pertains, including, but not limited to, name, address, phone number, fax number, email address, financial profiles, social security number, and credit card information. Personally Identifiable Information does not include information that is collected anonymously (that is, without identification of the individual user) or demographic information not connected to an identified individual.
PRIVACY_POLICY_TITLE2: What Personally Identifiable Information is collected?
WHY_REASON1_TEXT: Η μεγάλη μας εμπειρία στην αγορά της Μυκόνου, εγγυάται το καλύτερο αποτέλεσμα για την επιχείρησή σας.
WHY_REASON2_TEXT: Στόχος μας είναι να σας αποδώσουμε στην επιχείρησή σας την καλύτερη σχέση ποιότητας/τιμής
WHY_SUPPORT_TEXT: You will always have an experienced colleague of us by your side.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT1: You will contact our office and describe your needs in terms of number personnel you need to find accommodation for, the criteria of the accommodation as well as your available budget.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE2: We search for the best accommodation arrangements
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT2: We will search for the best estate or estates that fulfill your criteria and will provide the best possible accommodation to your personnel during their seasonal work.
HOW_IT_WORKS_TITLE3: Bring you in contact with estate owners
HOW_IT_WORKS_TEXT3: After the acceptance of our proposal we will bring you in contact with the owners for the completion of the process.
CONTACT_TEXT: Fill out the form and out team will get back to you as soon as possible.
MESSAGE_ACCEPT_TERMS1: By Submitting the message form you confirm that you agree with
MUST_ACCEPT_TERMS: You must accept terms of use & privacy policy to continue!
SUCCESS_CONTACT_US: Your message have been received. A colleague will be contacting you soon !
